title: "A" Collage
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106142819im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P2150030_3831.jpg)
This collage is dealing with images that start with letter "A". There is not really a concept I thought about, but I seen how funny it would look to mix these images. I mean an ape with a astronaut suit on holding an american flag is somewhat awkward to see. Even Barack Obama with an afro is something you would not see everyday. I just thought that this is an interesting visual because it is not organized and it is a mix of unlike images.
author: achristophe
